page.title: 17HEALTH CENTRE.
page.content:
{ {HEALTH The health centre is situated in Peterculter to the north of the A93. It was built in October 1971 and was the first health centre in Scotland.
{ EMPLOYEES The employees here all live near- by and many of them have been working here for quite some time.There are a total of 30 employees here. {PATIENTS In an average day,about 90 people attend the health centre for treat- ment. {TREATMENT The health centre offers a variety of medical services.They have a dentist and a G.P. on the premises.
